description: No breach of duty - reasonable care exercised
facts: Driver was traveling at the speed limit
Driver had both hands on the wheel
A child suddenly darted into the road from behind a parked car
Driver braked immediately but could not avoid the collision
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, negligence). defendant(c1, driver). plaintiff(c1, child). duty_owed(c1, yes). duty_breached(c1, no). reasonable_care(c1, yes). sudden_emergency(c1, yes). actual_cause(c1, yes). damages(c1, 2000). injury_type(c1, physical).
question: Is the driver liable for negligence?
rationale: While duty, causation, and damages exist, there was no breach. The driver exercised reasonable care (proper speed, attentive driving) and faced a sudden emergency that could not be avoided through reasonable precautions.
